parent.description: GTM Account's API relative path. Example: accounts/{account_id}.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

Container.description: Represents a Google Tag Manager Container, which specifies the platform tags will run on, manages workspaces, and retains container versions.

containerId.description: The Container ID uniquely identifies the GTM Container.

domainName.description: List of domain names associated with the Container. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.update

fingerprint.description: The fingerprint of the GTM Container as computed at storage time. This value is recomputed whenever the account is modified.

tagIds.description: All Tag IDs that refer to this Container.

tagManagerUrl.description: Auto generated link to the tag manager UI

taggingServerUrls.description: List of server-side container URLs for the Container. If multiple URLs are provided, all URL paths must match. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.update

usageContext.description: List of Usage Contexts for the Container. Valid values include: web, android, or ios. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.update

supportBuiltInVariables.description: Whether this Container supports built-in variables

supportGtagConfigs.description: Whether this Container supports Google tag config.

supportUserPermissions.description: Whether this Container supports user permissions managed by GTM.

supportVersions.description: Whether this Container supports Container versions.

$block: Represents a Google Tag Manager Container, which specifies the platform tags will run on, manages workspaces, and retains container versions.

$ul: **containerId**: The Container ID uniquely identifies the GTM Container.
**domainName**: List of domain names associated with the Container. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.update
**supportBuiltInVariables**: Whether this Container supports built-in variables
**supportGtagConfigs**: Whether this Container supports Google tag config.
**supportUserPermissions**: Whether this Container supports user permissions managed by GTM.
**supportVersions**: Whether this Container supports Container versions.
**fingerprint**: The fingerprint of the GTM Container as computed at storage time. This value is recomputed whenever the account is modified.
**tagIds**: All Tag IDs that refer to this Container.
**tagManagerUrl**: Auto generated link to the tag manager UI

**taggingServerUrls**: List of server-side container URLs for the Container. If multiple URLs are provided, all URL paths must match. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.update
**usageContext**: List of Usage Contexts for the Container. Valid values include: web, android, or ios. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.update
